about_the_game:
Do you like horror games but can’t handle horror games? Not Spooky takes on the vibe and ambiance of a horror-lite game while promising one thing. The jump scares are disabled by default. Stop watching people play horror games and try one out for yourself!

A tragedy has befallen the community theatre of Lincolnville. Uncover what happened and finally come to terms with the truth.

Lay your distorted views to rest.

Investigate your way through different locales such as the theatre, forests, and urban areas. Solve puzzles and unravel the story behind the community theatre.

WARNING: This game talks about sensitive topics and has flashing lights.

Features:
  • No Jumpscares
  • Spooky
  • Low Poly Art
  • Demo Average Length: 15 minutes
  • Short Episodic installments

name: Not Spooky: But Good Enough For Me

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Celeron(R) CPU N3060 @ 1.60GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: In this first-person horror-lite game, investigate your way through different locales such as the theatre, forests, and urban areas. Solve puzzles and unravel the story behind what happened at the community theatre.
